about

Hi, my name is Jonas Rossou. I'm a junior web developer based in Antwerp. I describe myself as a passionate and dedicated web engineer who loves coding, open source, and the web platform. I formerly worked as a banker, at ING & Deutsche Bank. I'm still interested in finance and financial markets. I learned building websites and web applications at BeCode. The training have made me become a Junior frontend or backend developer with great professional soft skills: reliable, eager to learn, team player with a solution mindset.
